author: hewman
title: modern
review: This is like an updated version of the 885, it came about as the smaller sets started departing from the 90% grey in them. Very cute set and great to build a little army of them, or should I say, space force.

author: petro17sq
title: Simple but great
review:
So simple, but so great, one of the best small classic space set.
The small ship is awesome with the white minifigure with his big gun.
Set like this one is why classic space is so special  
Brings back great memories.

author: qmtAFOL
title: First Set Ever!
review: Fond memories of this little set.  It was my very first set ever.  I remember getting a couple more later and pretending I had a small fleet of these little ships.   Just enough to get me started on my Lego collection.   It wasn't the most playable, as all you can do with it is sit the minifigure and put him in different poses, but when you're just a kid that probably doesn't matter!
